name: DYSTROPICANA
description:
NOTE: If playing on Itch Client please click 'Show Local Files' instead of the Launch button.

Concept

dystropicana is a digital multimedia archipelago first conceptualized during a one day jam in the year 2k16.

look at the beautiful coral reefs and lie to me about all the dead parts and soda cans

includes:

  • interactive explorations of various sectors of the archipelago
  • music to stare at waves to
  • travel diary entry
  • official marketing video
  • networked buzzword generator
  • and more

🌴🔥

Credits

By Troy Duguid, Gabriel Helfenstein, Merle Leufgen, Tristan Neu
